entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NETSDK1179 (for `-r`) over-reports #21560

Closed

  • Open issues: Support targeting iOS and Android with the .NET SDK #11275
    6.0.1xx
  • Support installing workloads in user folder #18104
    6.0.1xx
  • winexe vs maui, `<outputtype>app</outputtype>` #18799
    6.0.1xx
  • .NET 6 Support targeting iOS and Android with the .NET SDK #12899
    6.0.1xx
  • `sql-cache` is no longer bundled in dotnet-sdk but still in document #13016
  • Localized resources in the CLI adds 53 MB on disk and increases time-to-main by ~50% #16196
    6.0.2xx
  • CLI files layout includes "ref" directories that aren't required and add to size on disk/installer time #16197
    6.0.2xx
  • Unable to compile my .net core app using build #21498
    Discussion
  • `dotnet tool install -a` works great #21392
  • Separate the logic of including extra GeneratedInstallers from Package step #8727
    Backlog
  • Cannot install prereleased tool package from dotnet-install-tool without specifying the exact version #9037
    6.0.1xx
  • Unable to update global tool to the latest prerelease version #2551
    Discussion
  • version comparison is not robust #2158
    3.0.1xx
  • Investigate running CI in Linux/ARM64 box #10361
    3.0.1xx
  • official documentation for DotNetCliToolReference netcoreapp2.2 cap #10396
    3.0.1xx
  • Enable C++/CLI tests #3785
    7.0.1xx
  • Different result when running test in mac temp directory #3923
    Backlog
  • User facing string view for dotnet search #10586

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1394078 #21563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix over-warning bug when specifying runtime CLI option on dotnet run #21561
    Area-CLI
  • Update man pages #21557
  • Switch to 1ES R&D pools on main #21549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21539
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix up some test packages #21252
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove sql-cache from dotnet help #21464
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Razor] Fixes pack incrementalism issue (#21506) #21541
    Servicing-consider, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate.source-build dependency #21505
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Razor] Fixes pack incrementalism issue #21506
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21487
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #21199
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make workload descriptions localizable #21189
    Area-Workloads
  • Prevent GlobalUsings file from being cleaned. #21460
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix Bash shebang for scripts to run under FreeBSD #21361
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make aspnet-browser-refresh.js tolerate duplication insertions #21429
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update System.CommandLine version #21321
    Area-CLI
  • Add OS and Process Architecture #21517
    Area-Infrastructure
